headline: UBS Cuts The Trade Desk, Inc. (TTD)’s Price Target to $80, Maintains Buy Rating
summary: The Trade Desk, Inc. (NASDAQ:TTD) is among the 13 Best S&P 500 Stocks to Buy According to Wall Street Analysts, based on upside potential. However, on August 15, analysts at UBS lowered the stock’s price target to $80 from $105, while maintaining a Buy rating for its shares. This follows BofA Securities’ recent rating adjustment […]
